sourcesContent: import { Flex, Input, Text, Box, Button, Img } from '@chakra-ui/react' import cardMobile from './images/cards-mobile.png' import cardDesktop from './images/bg-card-front.png' import { useState } from 'react' function App() { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ cardholderName: '', cardNumber: '', expMonth: '', expYear: '', cvc: '', }) function handleChange(event) { const { name, value, type, checked } = event.target setFormData((prevFormData) => { return { ...prevFormData, [name]: type === 'checkbox' ? checked : value, } }) } return ( {/* mobile : l 0 / r 0 */} {/* row 1 : cardholder name */} cardholder name {/* row 2 : card number */} card number {/* row 3 : exp / cvc */} {/* exp date */} exp. date (mm/yy) {/* cvc */} cvc ) } export default App
